mapper.select: select * from tftube_recentvideo where member_no=#{member_no} order by no desc

select * from tftube_video a join tftube_recentvideo b on a.video_name=b.video_name
select c.name tfmember.member c (select member_no from tftube_video a join tftube_recentvideo b on a.video_name=b.video_name)d on a.member_no=b.member_no
